thread.section_title: Archer Hotel New York - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful but small rooms
thread.title_full: Wonderful but small rooms - Review of Archer Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: sandrasN6079QH
title: Wonderful but small rooms
text: European size room but VERY nicely appointed with lovely linens, bedding, soft towels, bathrobes, expresso machine, totally filled minibar with many treats and drink options. Skybar was wonderful with views of Empire state building, Excellent Small bites, Sliders and Ahi Tacos and a quiet room for small groups. Ask for Asia, our server! Charlie Palmer Steakhouse had wonderful Brunch! Reception and Concierge Service was also Excellent!
